attributes.action: put all possible pressure on the government of Afghanistan to prevent the execution of Sayed Pervez Kambaksh
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sayed Pervez Kambaksh is a 23-year-old journalism student in Afghanistan who has been sentenced to death for blasphemy without recourse to legal representation. His offence was to download and distribute a tract which said that fundamentalists had misrepresented the views of the Prophet Muhammad on the role of women in society.

rejection.details: Your address is outside the UK.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
